nomeDoTeste: Checkout via cartão sem preencher os dados do cartão

checkout.query: mutation Checkout($items: [CheckoutItemInput!]!, $freight: Float!, $paymentMethod: String!, $cardData: CardDataInput) { checkout(items: $items, freight: $freight, paymentMethod: $paymentMethod, cardData: $cardData) { freight items { productId quantity } paymentMethod } }
